p: There is a poor prognosis for the disease in middle and older aged patients ( 28). In a study on 44672 confirmed cases in China, case fatality rate was highest in the group of over 80 years (14.77%), followed by the age group between 70 to 80 years (7.96%) and no mortality was reported in age group below 10 years ( 30). Even though death outcome is uncommon in young people, a few deaths are reported in this age group in China and Iran.
